I'll check. Great. Thank you.

Okay. And?

We did this.

She's 75.
Twenty-five or 75, she wants him to stop his cancer treatment.

So, tell me.

Well, legally, you have to respect my wishes.

The whole thing was my idea.

That ain't right.
